251187.「なんで みつからへんのや。\n ウチの情報が 間違うてたんか？\n いや そん:
Why can't I find it? Was my information wrong?
No, that can't be it.

251188.「あらまぁ 精が出ますなぁ。\n もしかして 探してはるのは これやろか？:
Oh, my, he's very energetic. Perhaps this is
what you're looking for?

251190.「……ばあちゃん。\n やっぱり あの魔物……\n 陰果の罪業のこと 知ってたん:
Grandma. I knew it, that monster... he knew
about the Sin of Yin/Yang, didn't he?

251191.「まぁ……の。私かて 陰衆の頭領を務めた身。\n 過去の災いや 陰衆が扱う術の危:
Well...of course. Even I was the chieftain of the Yinshu. I naturally know about the past disasters and the dangers of the techniques
used by the Yinshu.

251192.「秘術についても 調べさせてもろたわ。\n まさか オウマが 研究しておったとは:
I also looked into the secret arts. I was
surprised that Ouma had studied it, but I
guess I was too late.

251193.「ウチが カミハルムイの宿屋で 話を聞いた時\n 教えてくれたって よかったやん:
I'm glad you told us when we talked to you at
the Inn in Kamiharmui. My own grandson asked
for it.

251194.「……あかん。\n お前は あの陽衆の娘に肩入れしとる。\n ロクなことにならん:
Oh no. You're in love with that Yang Clan
girl. I knew it wouldn't end well.

251195.「それに これは お前が 陽衆のヤツらなんかと\n 仲良うしてるから 起こったこ:
Besides, this is what happens when you are
friends with those Yang Clan guys.

251196.「あのアサヒとつるんで ニコニコしおって。\n 陽衆に毒されて 陰衆としての誇り:
You're smiling while hanging out with that Asahi. Have you been so poisoned by the Yang Clan that you have lost your pride as a member
of the Yin Clan?

251198.「私の孫ともあろう者が こんな不始末を\n しでかすとは 正直 思っとらんかった:
I honestly never thought that my grandson
would mismanage things like this. That's
precisely why...

251199.「これは そんなフヌけた孫を 野放しにしとった\n 私の責任でもある。アサヒごと:
This is my fault for letting such a foolish grandson go free. I'll bury the monster with Asahi, and settle the fate of the people in
the shadows.

251200.「あかん！\n あの子は…… アサヒは ウチが助ける。\n どうか その書をウチ:
Oh no! That boy... we'll save Asahi. Please,
give me the book...

251201.「話になりまへんな。それに この秘術の書には\n 陰果の罪業を倒す方法は 書かれ:
That's not much of a story. Besides, this Book of Secrets does not describe how to help the owner of the body, even though it does
describe how to defeat the Sin of Yin/Yang.

251202.「私の息子…… オウマでも\n その方法は 見つけられんかったようやね。\n ど:
My son, even Ouma couldn't find a way to do
that. In any case, Asahi will not be saved.

251203.「ウソやろ……。\n ほんなら どないしたら ええねん……。:
You're kidding... then what am I supposed to
do...

251204.「身体をのっとられたのが アサヒでよかったわ。\n お前は おとなしく 待っとき:
I'm glad it was Asahi who took my body. You
just wait and see. I'll take care of
everything.

251206.「シノノメおじちゃん！？\n こんな 遠い所まで どないしたん？:
Uncle Shinonome! What are you doing so far
away from here?

251207.「悲劇は くり返されようとしている。\n 陽衆と陰衆は また引き裂かれるのか……:
The tragedy is about to be repeated. Yang Clan
and Yin Clan will be torn apart again...

251208.「オウマ…… オウマよ。\n どうか チカラを 貸しておくれ。: Ouma... Ouma. Please lend me your strength.

251209.「ヨイちゃん。よく聞きなさい。\n オウマの秘術の研究には 続きがあった。\n:
Yoi. Listen carefully. There was more to
Ouma's mystical research. He was trying to
save everything.

251210.「どうか 記憶をたどり 夢幻の森に……。:
Please, follow your memories to Dream
Forest...

251211.「おじちゃん？ シノノメおじちゃん！？\n 夢幻の森？ 夢幻の森に 何か あるん:
Uncle? Uncle Shinonome! Dream Forest? There's
something in the Dream Forest, isn't there?

251212.「……ひとつ 心あたりがある。夢幻の森の奥の\n 北西の方角には 小さなほこらが:
I have an idea. There's a small dustbowl in the northwest corner of the back of Dream Forest. Would please check it
out?

251213.「ウチは シノノメおじちゃんを\n 家に送ってから すぐに追いかける。\n ええ:
I'm going after Uncle Shinonome right after I
drop him off at home. Right? The northwest
corner of Dream Forest, right?

251214.「<pc>。合流できて よかった。\n ちゃんと ほこらを 見つけられたんやね。:
<pc>. I'm glad we could meet up. I'm
glad you were able to find the fort.

251215.「やっぱり ここや……。\n ウチは 子供の頃 父上に連れられて\n この場所に:
I knew this was the place... my father used to
take me here when I was a kid...

251216.「あの頃は ここがなんのための場所か\n わからんかったけど 父上は ここで\n:
Back then, I didn't know what this place was
for, but my father was here studying secret
arts for the Yang Clan and the Yin Clan...

251217.「父上 どんな思いやったんやろう？\n 陰衆として しいたげられながら それでも:
Father, how did you feel? He was treated like
a member of the underworld, and yet he still
held hands with Uncle Shinonome...

251218.「おじちゃんに 嫉妬することは なかった？\n 悔しくて 真っ黒な気持ちを\n:
Were you ever jealous of your uncle? Did you
never have blackened feelings of regret in
your heart?

251219.「ウチな……ずっと 考えてたんや。\n テンオツ貴人に 未熟な頭領や言われたこと:
I've been thinking. What Nobleman Tenotsu
called me an immature chieftain... and what
Grandma said was my fault...

251220.「吹っ切れたように 見せかけて 表面だけ\n 取りつくろって ほんまは ウチ ア:
They tried to make it look like they were over
it, but the truth is that they didn't really
believe in Asahi. I thought.

251221.「きっと ウチの中にある そんな黒い感情が\n 気づかんうちに あふれだして 陰:
I'm sure that black feeling inside of us must have overflowed without us realizing it, and we were taken advantage of by the sin of
Yin/Yang...

251223.「……これ。父上の手記や。\n 見てみ <pc>。一緒に読んでみようや。:
...this. Father's journal. Take a look
<pc>. Let's read it together.

251224.<center>シノノメは すごい！\nいつも明るく 誰に対しても 接し方を変え:
Shinonome is amazing! She is always cheerful and never changes her attitude toward anyone. She treats me, a member of the shadows, as an
equal.

251225.<center>話していると楽しくて お互いを認め合える。\n陰衆としての自分を:
We enjoy talking with each other and we appreciate each other. I even think that I was the only one who looked down on myself as a
"shady" person.

251226.<center>シノノメとなら 天地雷鳴士の未来を変えられる。\nそんな風に信頼:
With Shinonome, I can change the future of Tenchi Druid. Finding a friend I can trust like that is my own personal good fortune that
none of the past chieftains of the Yinshu had.

251227.<center>遠くない未来…… ヨイとアサヒの時代に\n陽衆と陰衆が手を取り合:
For now, let's just continue our study of the secret arts so that in the future, when the Yang and Yin clans join hands in the time of
Yoi and Asahi, we can help each other.

251229.「……せや。\n ウチ アサヒといると楽しくて 自然と\n アサヒと一緒にいる時:
I enjoyed spending time with Asahi. I enjoyed
spending time with Asahi, and naturally I
liked spending time with him.

251230.「確かに ウチの心の中に アサヒへの嫉妬や羨望\n そういった感情があるのは 認:
I admit that I have feelings of jealousy and
envy toward Asahi. I also admire Asahi for
doing things that I can't do.

251231.「せやけど そんなアサヒのこと\n 素直に 認めることができた時\n ウチ 自分:
But when I was able to honestly admit that to
Asahi, I felt proud of myself.

251232.「陽衆と陰衆が 手を取り合うことは\n 絶対に 間違いなんかやあらへんって\n:
I myself want to prove that there is
absolutely nothing wrong with Yang Clan and
Yin Clan working hand in hand!

251234.「せや！ \n アサヒを救う 手掛かりを見つけんと。: Yes! We have to find a way to save Asahi.

251235.<center>陰果の罪業に 身体をのっとられる段階までいくと\n事態の解決は:
When a person's body is taken over by the Sin of Yin/Yang, it is difficult to resolve the situation. This is because it is not easy to
recover the ego of the original owner of the body.

251236.<center>自我を取り戻すには その人自身の心を\n強く 揺さぶることが 必:
To regain one's ego, a person needs to be
strongly moved by his or her own mind.
However, there is no single solution.

251237.「……心を 揺さぶる方法って どんなんやろ？: What's the best way to get your heart pumping?

251238.「大変でおじゃる～！ 身体をのっとられた\n アサヒ殿が カムイラの穴に戻ってき:
Oh my goodness! The stripped and robbed Lord
Asahi has returned to Kamuira Hole and is
confronting Yoi's grandmother!

251239.「マロは シノノメ殿に頼まれて\n ここまで ヨイ殿と <pc>殿を\n 呼びに:
Maro was asked by Shinonome to come here to
call Yoi and <pc>.

251240.「おふたりとも 早く\n カムイラの穴に 向かうでおじゃる～！:
You two, head for Kamuira Hole as fast as you
can!

251241.「急いで ばあちゃんを止めないと！\n このままじゃ アサヒは……。:
We have to hurry! We have to stop Grandma! If
we don't do something, Asahi will...

251242.「アサヒの自我を 取りもどす方法は まだ\n わからんけど ウチは 先に向かって:
I still don't know how to get Asahi's ego
back, but we're moving on! <pc> come
soon.

251243.「グォォォォォ……！\n 我のジャマを するなァ！: Guoh...! Stay out of my way!

251244.「年寄りやからって なめんといておくれや。\n お前さんくらいの魔物なんて\n:
Please don't underestimate me just because I'm old. I'll take care of you, and I'll eviscerate a monster the size of you in a
Chacha.

251246.「アマツカミト チギリカワシ チカラヲモツテ\n アサカゼ ユウカゼ フキハラウ:
Amatsukamito chigirikawashi chikara wo motte
asakaze yuukaze fukihara ugotokusubetenotsumi
uchiharai tamae!

251249.「ふん。\n 陰果の罪業とやらも こんなもんかね……: Hmm. So much for the sin of Yin/Yang...

251252.「残念だったな。陰衆の先々代よ。\n この身体を得た我は 完全無欠だ。:
Sorry to hear that. I am Yin's ancestor. I,
who have gained this body, am perfect.

251255.「とにかく 今は あの魔物を止めないと……！: Anyway, we have to stop that monster now...!

251257.「アサヒ！ アサヒ！！\n ウチや ヨイや！\n ウチの声が 聞こえてるんやろ？:
Asahi! Asahi! It's me, Yoi! I know you can
hear me.

251259.「……こんなもん なんってこと あ…らへん。\n アサヒを 助けるた…めやっ…た:
This is nothing. If I save Asahi I'll get back
up again and again...

251260.「アサヒ……。ウチや…で……。\n ウ…チのこと もう わからへんの……？:
Asahi... it's us... so... you don't know us
anymore?

251262.「アサヒ！？\n そうや。ウチや！ ヨイや！: Asahi! Yes, that's right. It's us! Yoi!

251263.<center>どう…か…… 今のうちに……\nあたしは 大丈夫だから…… 信じ:
I don't know... but while you're at it...
trust me... I'm fine.

251265.「ヨイ。何しとるん。 \n ぼさっとしとらんと 今のうちに\n 秘術で そいつを:
Yoi. What are you doing? Don't just stand
there, use your mystic arts to defeat him
while you still can!

251266.「せやな。ウチが アサヒのこと信じへんかったら\n 誰が アサヒのこと 信じるん:
That's right. If we don't believe in Asahi,
who will believe in Asahi? Thank you
<cs_pchero>.

251267.「アマツカミト チギリカワシ チカラヲモツテ\n アサカゼ ユウカゼ フキハラウ:
Amatsukamito chigirikawashi chikara wo motte
asakaze yuukaze fukihara ugotokusubetenotsumi
uchiharai tamae!

251271.「アホちゃうか！\n こんな時にまで 人のことばっかり。\n 無事やなかったのは:
You're an idiot! Even at a time like this,
you're always talking about other people.
You're the one who wasn't safe.

251272.「ううん。ごめんね。ヨイちゃん ひとりに\n こんな大きな罪を 背負いこませて。:
Nah. I'm sorry. Yoi, I'm sorry for making you
bear such a big responsibility. I knew it was
a big burden to bear...

251273.「これは ウチの弱さが招いたことや。\n あんたが 謝ることなんて なんもあらへ:
This was caused by our weakness. You have
nothing to apologize for.

251274.「それに…… 魔物が生まれた あの時\n なんで ウチのこと かばったりしたん？:
And... why did you cover for us when the
monster was born?

251275.「なんでって 友達だから……。\n 考えるより先に 身体が\n 勝手に動いちゃっ:
Because we're friends... my body moved on its
own before I could think.

251276.「それなのに 失敗しちゃって\n 結局は ヨイちゃんに 助けてもらって……\n:
And yet, I failed, and in the end, Yoi helped
me out... Yoi is still amazing.

251277.「……アホか。\n あんたって やっぱり アホがつくほどの\n お人好しやわ……:
You're an idiot.... You're such a softy after
all...

251280.「今回は お前たちのほうが\n 一枚上手やったようやけど 私は ふたりのこと\n:
Steel Lance, you may have gotten the better of
me this time, but that doesn't mean I approve
of the two of you.

251281.「また何か 不始末を起こしたら\n すぐ来ますさかい せいぜい おきばりやす。:
If we see any more misbehavior, we will come
back soon, so please be sure to be at your
best.

251284.「父上の……。\n ばあちゃんが 持っといたほうが\n ええと思うねん。読んでみ: I think you should have it, Grandma. Read it.

251285.「まったく。親子そろって\n 同じ未来を願うなんて その あきらめの悪さ\n い:
I know... I wonder who it was that gave up on
me...

251287.「冗談言わんといて。\n ほな またな。: Don't joke about it. I'll see you later.

251288.「これで 一件落着や！\n ほっとしたら お腹すいたわー。:
Now the case is closed! I'm so relieved, but
I'm hungry.

251289.「ゆーえーにー！\n 帰ろか。ウチらの家に。:
Yeeeeeeeeeeeee! Let's go home. Let's go back
to our house.

251291.「アサヒ。あんた そんな すぐ動いて\n 身体のほうは 大丈夫なん？: Asahi. Are you okay to move so quickly?

251292.「んー。なんともないみたいっ。: Hmm. It seems to be all right.

251293.「ねねねっ。それより あたし\n ヨイちゃんに 聞きたいことがあるの。:
I want to ask you something. I want to ask Yoi
something.

251294.「あたし てっきり ヨイちゃんが 想望華で\n おまじないをしたのは 好きな人が:
I thought Yoi did the spell at Soumohana
because she had found someone she liked...

251295.「もしかして 今回の事件の\n 予兆に 気づいていたからだったの！？:
Could it be that it was because he was aware
of the signs of this incident?

251296.「……せやね。悪い予感がしてたから\n いてもたっても おられへんかって\n な:
...That's right. I had a bad feeling about
this, and couldn't stand by and let it happen,
so I was looking for something I could do.

251297.「さっすが ヨイちゃん。\n 願いのチカラで 陰衆の魔物を\n やっつけようとし:
That's great, Yoi. You used the power of a
wish to defeat the monsters of the underworld!

251298.「いや……。正確には 願ったことは\n ちょっと ちゃうんやけど……。: Well... not exactly what I wished for, but...

251299.「えっ。違うの！？\n じゃあ あの時 ヨイちゃんが\n 想望華に 願ったことっ:
Eh. That's not right! Then what was it that
Yoi wished for Soumouka back then?

251300.「……秘密や 秘密！！ \n そんなん今さら ほじくり返さんでも\n ええやん！:
Secrets, secrets! You don't need to dredge
that up now!

251301.「えー。なんでー？ 気になるぅ。\n ヨイちゃん 教えて？: What? Why? I'm curious. Yoi, can you tell me?

251303.「……アサヒや。ご飯は まだかのう？: Asahi. Is the rice ready yet?

251304.「はいはーい。お父ちゃーん。\n 今 作るから 待っててねー。:
Yes, yes. Daddy. I'm making it now, so please
wait for me.

251305.「……<pc>。\n あんたも あの花に\n ウチが願ったこと 気になる？<ye:
...<pc>. Do you care what we wished
for that flower, too?<yesno><close>

251306.「あんたも 素直や あらへんね。\n ほんまは 気になってはるんやろ？\n あん:
You're not so honest yourself, are you? You're
really curious, aren't you? I'll make a
special effort to tell you.

251307.「……ほうか。\n あんたになら 特別に 教えてあげてもええ。:
Oh, well. I'll make a special effort to teach
you.

251308.「この花に ウチが 願ったのは\n これからも アサヒとウチと <pc>\n ３:
What we wish for this flower is that the friendship between Asahi, us, and three persons will continue
forever... will continue...

251309.「ウチな。こんなふうに 思うんや。\n もしかして アサヒの願いも\n ウチと:
I... This is what I think. Maybe Asahi's wish
was the same as ours...

251310.「最後に呼びかけた あの時 アサヒは\n 自我を 取りもどせたんやないかって。:
I called out to him for the last time,
thinking that maybe that was the moment when
Asahi regained his ego.

251311.「もしも そうやとしたら……\n ウチ むっちゃ うれしいわ。: If that's the case...I'm so happy.

258022.「……ま ほんまのところなんて わからんけど。: Well, I don't know the real story.
